question: Naaz Joshi, who won the Miss World Diversity 2019 title, is from which country?
explanation: India\'s transsexual woman Naaz Joshi has been  crowned Miss World Diversity 2019 at Port Louis in Mauritius on August 3. She has made the country proud with a third successive victory in the beauty pageant Miss World Diversity.  Apart from the Miss World Diversity title, Naaz also bagged the Best Project, Miss Congeniality, Miss Peopleâ€™s Choice Ambassador and Best National Costume titles. She was the first transgender in the world to win a coveted international crown against natural born females in 2017.
